name: Dog Feeder
description:
In this game you have to get the green food balls to the dog so he doesn't starve. You do that by rotating and translating platforms in certain ways.

controls:

"K" and "L" to rotate

"X" and "C" to translate

"N" to go to the next level

space to restart

This game was made for the ludum dare 46 compo. It's a 2D physics-based puzzle game with 5 levels.
